column1: Funeral services will be held on Thursday at 2 p. m. in the Roat-Kriner Funeral Home
column4: with the  Rev. Paul C. Converse
column5: pastor of the Christian Fellowship Church
column7: officiating. Interment will be  in Odd Fellows Cemetery
column8: Danville. There will be a viewing from 1-2 p. m. Military honors will be provided by the American Legion Post 40 honor guard.
